snippet: DON LARSEN, the only pitcher to throw a perfect game in the World Series, and his wife were in stable condition in a Northern California hospital yesterday after a 30-vehicle accident in which one person died. Mercy Medical Center in Shasta would ...
lead_paragraph: DON LARSEN, the only pitcher to throw a perfect game in the World Series, and his wife were in stable condition in a Northern California hospital yesterday after a 30-vehicle accident in which one person died. Mercy Medical Center in Shasta would not disclose the nature of the injuries to Larsen, 66, and his wife, CORRINE LARSEN, 64.
